title: Peanut butter white chocolate chip cookies
ingredients: ['110g soft brown sugar', '100g caster sugar', '110g butter', '1 egg, beaten', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '130g peanut butter', '190g plain flour', '1 teaspoon bicarb of soda', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '175g white chocolate chips (or chopped white chocolate)']
